NewsArticle.Title: Emerald Dawn
NewsArticle.Content:
A weary traveler has come to my tavern with many stories. She has urged me to invite Aislings from across the land to hear her tales. We have refreshments for sale to our patrons, as well as fresh flowers (while supplies last!)
Vevika, Barmaid of Suomi
((This is a Suomi Troupe Quest that will be implemented on May 23rd. Upon completion, various rewards will be given including: Legend Marks, experience and gold. Register your account to participate.))
